name: I Wanna be the Matryoshka
description:
I Wanna be the Matryoshka is an IWBTG fangame. If you don't know what those are, please check out fangam.es/intro. This game is also the sequel to I Wanna be the BHG, although playing BHG first isn't required to play Matryoshka.

A 2D platformer game about a boy going into a mountain to find someone. There are 5 stages, filled with gimmicks and a boss at the end of each. There's someone waiting for you.

(We do not own any songs or sprites used in this game besides a few original sprites/tiles. All rights go to their respective owners)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

dono - main developer, stage designer

KittyGame - boss designer, visual and coding help

YoYoYoDude - engine creator

Additional credits are listed in the game's readme file.
